name: Pasta Primavera

description: A light and flavorful pasta dish with seasonal vegetables tossed in a simple lemon garlic sauce. Perfect for a vegetarian meal.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A creamy and flavorful Indian dish with tender chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, simmered in a rich tomato and coconut milk sauce. Served with basmati rice.

name: Thai Green Curry with Vegetables
description: A fragrant and flavorful Thai curry with a medley of vegetables simmered in a creamy green curry sauce. Served with rice noodles for a satisfying meal.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, bacon, and parmesan cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A hearty Russian dish made with tender beef sirloin, mushrooms, and a creamy sour cream sauce.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy pasta dish made with grilled chicken, fettuccine pasta, and a rich Alfredo sauce.

name: Beef Chili
description: A hearty and flavorful chili made with ground beef, beans, tomatoes, and spices.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snow peas)
description: A quick and healthy dish made with colorful mixed vegetables, tofu, and a flavorful stir-fry sauce.

name: Beef Tacos
description: A delicious Mexican dish made with seasoned ground beef, crispy taco shells, and all the fixings.

name: Vegetable Soup

description: A zesty pasta dish made with succulent shrimp, linguine, and a garlic lemon sauce.

name: Honey Soy Glazed Salmon

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: A hearty vegetarian lasagna made with layers of pasta, cheese, and assorted vegetables.

name: Lemon Herb Roast Chicken
description: A juicy and flavorful roast chicken seasoned with lemon, garlic, and herbs.

description: A delicious Tex-Mex dish made with seasoned ground beef, rolled in corn tortillas and smothered in enchilada sauce and cheese.

description: Juicy pork chops cooked in a sweet and savory honey garlic glaze.

name: Vegetarian Chili
description: A hearty and flavorful chili made with beans, vegetables, and spices.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Tender chicken thighs marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served over rice.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A classic Italian dish made with succulent shrimp, garlic, butter, and white wine, served over pasta.

name: Crispy Baked Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy baked chicken tenders coated in seasoned breadcrumbs, served with honey mustard sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, and Parmesan cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Crispy baked chicken wings tossed in barbecue sauce, served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

description: A savory Chinese dish made with tender beef and broccoli in a flavorful sauce.
